title: High Priority Discovery Queue
description: Next batch of shows to score for the pool

batch.title: The Walking Dead
batch.reason: Massive cultural impact, 11 seasons, zombie genre elevated to prestige
batch.notes: Score based on peak (seasons 1-5), decline in later seasons

batch.title: Dexter
batch.reason: Showtime flagship, Michael C. Hall's iconic performance

batch.title: House
batch.reason: Medical procedural elevated by Hugh Laurie's performance
batch.notes: Strong character work, formulaic but executed brilliantly

batch.title: Fringe
batch.reason: JJ Abrams sci-fi mystery, strong mythology
batch.notes: Similar to X-Files, strong conceptual density

batch.title: Person of Interest
batch.reason: Jonathan Nolan pre-Westworld, AI surveillance themes

batch.title: The Good Wife
batch.reason: Acclaimed legal drama, 7 seasons, Emmy winner

batch.title: Damages
batch.reason: Glenn Close vs Rose Byrne, legal thriller

batch.title: Doctor Who
batch.notes: Consider RTD era vs Moffat era vs Chibnall
